scripts.setup: npm install && echo "Make sure MongoDB is running on your system"
scripts.test-db: node -e "const mongoose = require('mongoose'); mongoose.connect('mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017/loanmanagement').then(() => { console.log('✅ MongoDB connected'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.log('❌ MongoDB error:', err.message); process.exit(1); })"
